actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee on Foreign Affairs discharged in House.
Measure laid on table in House, roll call #196 (342-57).

official_title: A resolution to direct the President to furnish to the House of Representatives information and facts regarding understandings made with the Former Shah of Iran at Lackland Air Force Base and elsewhere.

summary.text: Directs the President to furnish the House of Representatives with information concerning U.S. commitments and obligations with regard to the former Shah of Iran.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the President to furnish to the House of Representatives information and facts regarding understandings made with the Former Shah of Iran at Lackland Air Force Base and elsewhere.
